page.title: 06Village Hall, N. Lopham
page.content:
The village hall stands on the left hand side of the road going to South Lopham. There is a football pitch there. The village hall is used for discoes, mother and toddler group, pop group, annual village fete, clay pigeon shooting, football and others. The village hall has been standing since 1931. The South Lopham people hadn't liked the North Lopham people, but they joined together to build the hall to share between the villages.
The village hall is placed rather dangerously, because people who want to bike to it have to bike down a heavily used bit of road. When the children from school have to go to the hall they have to walk down the road. However plans are being made for an adventure play ground, B.M.X. track and quarter pipe.
